segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the center of the kitchen, where a boy is causing quite a ruckus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a small two-step stool, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can clearly see a 'COOKIE JAR' inside, brimming with treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little body is stretched, one hand already in the jar, grabbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool beneath him looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting backward, and I'm sure it's going to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in his other hand, perhaps to catch his illicit spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of mischievous daring always makes me smile a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But my heart races watching him balance so precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height onto a hard floor would be quite painful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how determined children can be when cookies are involved.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would secure that stool before he gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on his prize, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
